resources.string: How often do you want to check in?
How much time do you need to respond?
Next wellness check will be at
Clicking yes will immediately send them a message via SMS asking to accept their role and rank your risk level.
Clicking yes will immediately send them a message via SMS asking for a new risk level.
Request permission from Emergency Contacts to turn off monitoring?
Sorry, you are not allowed to turn off monitoring at this time
Message will been sent to your emergency contacts.
Are you sure you want to turn off monitoring?
Alerts the user to perform wellness check

Will you be my Emergency Contact for the Wellness Check app?
 
 Reply:
 Y1 to accept and rate me as low risk
 Y2 to accept and rate me as medium risk
 Y3 to accept and rate me as high risk
 No to decline
 
 Low Risk allows me to turn off my own wellness checks
 Medium Risk requires permission from one of my Emergency Contacts to turn off wellness checks
 High risk requires permission from all of my Emergency Contacts to turn off wellness checks

May I please be considered for a new risk level?
 
 Reply:
 Y1 to rate me as low risk
 Y2 to rate me as medium risk
 Y3 to rate me as high risk
 No to decline
May I turn off my wellness checks? Reply: Yes or No
URGENT\n I missed my check in. Please check in on me.
Battery optimization prevents this app from initiating wellness checks. To fix this, click \'Settings\' and change filter to \'All Apps\' and turn off battery optimization for this app.

Your risk level determines how you are allowed to turn off your monitoring and is assigned to you by the emergency contacts you choose. Your overall risk level is determined by the highest rating you receive from your emergency contacts.
